userSelect.description: Optional, this property will cause the node to appear as a block
userSelect.description_zh: 文本是否可选，该属性会使节点显示为 block

selectable.description: Whether rich text can be selected by long press, it can be used for copy, paste, long press to search, etc
selectable.description_zh: 富文本是否可以长按选中，可用于复制，粘贴，长按搜索等场景
selectable.default: false（基础库 3.150.1 以前版本）true（基础库 3.150.1 及以后版本）

imageMenuPrevent.description: Prevent the default menu from popping up when you press and hold on an image (set this property to image-menu-prevent or image-menu-prevent="true"), which is only valid during initialization and cannot be changed dynamically, if you don't want to prevent the default menu from popping up, you don't need to set this property
imageMenuPrevent.description_zh: 阻止长按图片时弹起默认菜单（将该属性设置为image-menu-prevent或image-menu-prevent="true"），只在初始化时有效，不能动态变更；若不想阻止弹起默认菜单，则不需要设置此属性

preview.description: Whether the image in the rich text is clickable to preview. If rich-text is not listening for click events, it will be enabled by default. If the setting preview is not displayed, the default preview judgment will be clicked, and it is recommended to display the setting preview
preview.description_zh: 富文本中的图片是否可点击预览。在不设置的情况下，若 rich-text 未监听点击事件，则默认开启。未显示设置 preview 时会进行点击默认预览判断，建议显示设置 preview

onLongtap.description_zh: 触摸后，超过 500ms 再离开。
